ratings.comment: I thought Professor Goldstein was tough but fair.  He really knew the material and was more than accessible when I needed to meet with him. I found his lectures extremely insightful and he did a good job adding humor.  A word to the wise, be prepared when you come to class.  He does not suffer fools lightly.

Worst professor ever.  His projects were ridiculously hard.  He never explains any of the material and if he does he stands at the front of the room and reads the headings out of the textbook.  Gives pop quizzes.

Undoubtedly one of the worst professors I've ever had.  Assigns weekly readings of 100+ pages, then lectures the entire time on a minute detail. Gives ridiculous term projects that a monkey could get a passing grade on.  Any exams in the classes were online and were made from questions used by other schools, so the answers could be easily Googled
Very easy and nice teacher. He's funny and often goes on tangents which is great. Very nice man as well, very accomodating when it comes to special situations etc. I highly recommend him.
